description: Look Ten Years Younger - Without SurgeryFeeling years younger than your age but your looks are letting you down? Are you tired of your wrinkles and crows feet telling the world how old you are?How we feel and how we look does not always correlate. A hectic unhealthy lifestyle, stress, late nights, pollution, too much sun and bad skin maintenance habits can mean years on your face before you know it. By then it is too late and the only option seems to be expensive and potentially dangerous cosmetic surgery.Until now.... Our skin ages because a powerful compound called ceramides diminishes. Our skin loses hydration (which means we no longer have that nice full youthful look) and elasticity (making our skin look saggy and loose).For years in Japan, women and men have been taking a powerful plant based supplement called Phytoceramides, a lipid that works toward restoring the skin's fresh and soft appearance from within. It is so effective and powerful, it has been referred to as 'a miracle facelift in a bottle'.And now it has been approved by the FDA and available in the US.So what can one little 350mg pill of Phytoceramides do?-   Hydrates and nourishes from within. This healing and protective lipid works from the inner to the outer layer of skin.-   Fills in creases and cracks from aging and environmental damage.-   Protects from further damage and re-structures skin to look more youthful and radiant.One small 350mg pill daily will wipe years off your face and body. Softer, smoother, fresher skin can be yours in weeks but we suggest taking it long term to maintain the benefits.
